Reviews.Title: Price
Reviews.Author: Daniela Lugo
Reviews.Content: Beautiful color but I think this is very expensive compared to S3 that is also for $ 500 .. greetings.

Reviews.Title: Yes, My Wife LOVES it!
Reviews.Author: Phelps Lammar
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to have been designed with both male and  female in mind.I think that the S III is a little too big, but the II is just the right size.This phone is in a class by itself.  It has a sleek dynamic appeal and it's loaded with features and apps.There's just isn't much you can NOT do with this phone.Unlike any BlackBerry, it is a REAL smart phone thanks to the ANDROID OS.I went shopping for a GOOD phone at a reasonable price and came out with the Samsung GT-9100 Galaxy S II phone, what a wonder. This is actually a "PALM PC" that makes calls!TEN star rating from ME! * * * * * * * * * *

Reviews.Title: This is a fraud
Reviews.Author: Eva Carolina Godoy Contreras
Reviews.Content: At the beginning I had no problems with the phone, but now the screen turns off for no reason and will  not turn. I have neither dropped nor wetted  the phone. I took it to an authorized dealer of the Samsung and they told me that the phone is not original but refurbished with electronic parts that are not original samsung . That being the cause for its malfunctioning. This is a fraud.Don't buy it!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Randoll
Reviews.Content: it's very fast, very nice, I bought this phone for my girlfriend and she is fascinated, she love it .

Reviews.Title: Expensive Chinese fake: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Gal Kaminka
Reviews.Content: Despite coming in a Samsung box, with the right logo and everything you'd expect,this is a cheap (in the sense of quality, not in price) Chinese fake.  Died within a coupleof months, and when taken to repair shop, the technician was able to show me exactlythe difference between the original (black or white) models, and this one.DO NOT BUY!
